name: The Tower with No Stairs
description:
Untitled Game Jam #34

Theme: Destruction

A short simple game where you must destroy things in order to progress.

Everything in The Tower can be destroyed, including you, the checkpoints and the level exit :)

No sounds this time around, i joined late and there wasnt enough time lol

edit: I fixed the checkpoints after the jam ended so they actually work now

A: Move right

D:Move left

Space: Jump

Mouse: Aim

Hold LMB: throw bomb

Release LMB: detonate bomb
